critique: The document is a presidential order focused on seismic safety standards for federally owned or leased buildings. It mandates the adoption of minimum standards developed by the Interagency Committee on Seismic Safety in Construction (ICSSC) and requires agencies to assess and mitigate seismic risks in their buildings. There is nothing about Ideological Tilt, Immigration Approach, Executive Power, Federalism, Security vs. Liberty, Economic Regulation, or Social Inclusion.
